title: Research and Analysis
content: This involves collecting data and feedback from potential users, analyzing market trends, and defining the project goals and objectives.

title: Design and Prototyping
content: Creating design concepts and prototypes to determine whether the design meets the needs and expectations of the target audience.

title: Testing and Feedback
content: Gathering user feedback to validate the design concepts. And making modifications to the design where necessary to improve its usability.

title: Launch and Refinement
content: Product monitoring after launch. Gather more feedback, make further improvements and enhance the overall user experience over time.
